title: What is the biggest piece of land owned by ONE person? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to top 15 list of worlds landowners the biggest piece of land owned by one person is Queen Elizabeth II. She owns a total of 6.6 billion Acres and yes I did say billion. She is the head of the British Commonwealth and as such is the owner of this land which includes places like Canada, Australia, Britain, Ireland, and the Falkland Islands. The second largest landowner is some King from Saudi Arabia with a little over 500 million Acres.
